entry.title: Lightning over taproot with PTLCs
entry.summary: In a conversation, the speaker suggests that using H(private-key, msg, other-party's-nonce-pair, 1) would work. They initially thought that other-party's-nonce-pair would be unique unknown randomness but realized it could be rederived from RA(n) or RB(n). The speaker then acknowledges that they should have read a certain part more closely and mentions that the proposal uses the single sig adaptor sig variant.
